name: iidoo
description:
What is Project iidoo?

iidoo is a kind of adorable creature born from mystery sprouts. This game is all about curing yourself by building relationships with little creatures and nature. In Project iidoo, you will experience creating iidoos using your water can and create a world of life with the companions of your little iidoos 🌱(=•ェ•=).

Credits:

Game Design/Programming/iidoo Art: Albert "You" Liang.

Background music: Heartbreaking by Kevin MacLeod | https://incompetech.com/

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
